alert.note: Alert for Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 24 at 2:49PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Polk County through 330 PM EDT... At 249 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Wales, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winter Haven, Bartow, Lake Wales, Jan Phyl Village, Dundee, Eagle Lake, Alturas, Inwood, Highland City, Cypress Gardens, Lake Wales Municipal Airport, Bartow Municipal Airport, Wahneta, Waverly, and Lakeland Highlands. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central Florida.
